Hinata

Korean: 히나타

Hometown:

Aichi, Nagoya

Full name:
Sohara Hinata

Birthday:

Age:
22 years old
Height:
5'2" (157 cm)
Group (2022-present):
XG

Introduction

Sohara Hinata is a Japanese-South Korean singer and dancer under XGALX. She is best known as the main dancer and sub vocalist of the Japanese global girl group XG.

When Hinata was young, she attended a dance class in her neighborhood. In one day, the staff there told her that there's a little test coming up, they asked her if she was interested and that was the XG audition so she discussed it with her mom and told her she wanted to do it. That what led her to debut with XG.

On February 1, 2022, Hinata was revealed as the fourth member of XG. The group officially debuted on Mar 18, 2022, with their debut digital single "Tippy Toes".
